scripts.deploy: cd ../../.. && git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && cd js-fullstack/javascript/todo-list && npm run build && cd ../../.. && git add build/ && (git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m 'Deploy: todo-list') && git subtree split --prefix build -b gh-pages-temp && git push origin gh-pages-temp:gh-pages && git checkout main && git branch -D gh-pages-temp
